Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: This is the most southwest corner of the great Tower Castle of Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: From here, the circular hallway stretches into a dimly lit distance to the east. Several torches have burned out along here, and someone is going to be punished for not replacing them. The open door on the north side goes to the Griffon's Heart Pub, a drinking place for the castle's troops.
